This is a list of former Malaszec colonies, which were established during the final Malaszec Empire.

Name Date established Date dissolved Region controlled Today a part of
Tankirne 1920 23 November 1937 T’annkirne T’annkirne
Djoata ? 1928 Northern Bangsalaya, including the Suarna Peninsula Bangsalaya
Szreszejlas 1789 ? Southern archipelago Lu’umil
